children.name: Jagged Little Pill
children.description: 'Jagged Little Pill' took the pent-up angst of a child actress, mixed it with a failed relationship with a former star of 'Full House,' and became one of the biggest one-album wonders in rock history.

children.name: Falling Into You
children.description: Want to know the biggest selling albums of the last 20 years? Look in your mother's CD collection. Seriously, she buys like two albums per decade, when she's looking for shopping for new tupperware at Target.
